text: 今日はいい天気ですね。
romaji: Kyou wa ii tenki desu ne.
english: The weather is nice today, isn't it?

text: お名前は何ですか？
romaji: Onamae wa nan desu ka?
english: What is your name?

text: どこから来ましたか？
romaji: Doko kara kimashita ka?
english: Where are you from?

text: 日本語は難しいですね。
romaji: Nihongo wa muzukashii desu ne.
english: Japanese is difficult, isn't it?

text: 映画を見に行きませんか？
romaji: Eiga o mi ni ikimasen ka?
english: Would you like to go see a movie?

text: それはいくらですか？
romaji: Sore wa ikura desu ka?
english: How much is that?

text: ゆっくり話してください。
romaji: Yukkuri hanashite kudasai.
english: Please speak slowly.

text: この映画は感動的で、最後のシーンでは泣いてしまいました。
romaji: Kono eiga wa kandouteki de, saigo no shiin de wa naite shimaimashita.
english: This movie was so moving that I ended up crying at the final scene.

text: 週末は友達と山にハイキングに行って、とても楽しかったです。
romaji: Shuumatsu wa tomodachi to yama ni haikingu ni itte, totemo tanoshikatta desu.
english: I went hiking in the mountains with friends over the weekend and had a great time.

text: 誕生日には家族と一緒にレストランで美味しいディナーを食べました。
romaji: Tanjoubi ni wa kazoku to issho ni resutoran de oishii dinā o tabemashita.
english: I had a delicious dinner with my family at a restaurant for my birthday.

text: 絶対に諦めない。それが俺の忍道だ！
romaji: Zettai ni akiramenai. Sore ga ore no nindou da!
english: I'll never give up. That's my ninja way!

text: 海賊王に俺はなる！
romaji: Kaizoku-ou ni ore wa naru!
english: I'm going to become the King of the Pirates!

text: おめぇはもうオラに勝てねぇ。
romaji: Omee wa mou ora ni katenee.
english: You can't beat me anymore.

text: このノートに名前を書かれた人間は死ぬ。
romaji: Kono nooto ni namae o kakareta ningen wa shinu.
english: Anyone whose name is written in this notebook will die.

text: 知識と認識は必ずしも一致しない。
romaji: Chishiki to ninshiki wa kanarazushimo icchi shinai.
english: Knowledge and awareness are not always the same.

text: もう二度と、負けねぇから！
romaji: Mou nidoto, makenee kara!
english: I'll never lose again!

text: 俺が火影になることで、みんなを守れるようになる！
romaji: Ore ga Hokage ni naru koto de, minna o mamoreru you ni naru!
english: By becoming Hokage, I'll be able to protect everyone!

text: 俺が仲間を守る！誰にも傷つけさせない！
romaji: Ore ga nakama o mamoru! Dare ni mo kizutsukesasenai!
english: I'll protect my friends! I won't let anyone hurt them!

text: 俺は仲間と一緒に夢を追い続ける！
romaji: Ore wa nakama to issho ni yume o oitsuzukeru!
english: I'll keep chasing my dream with my friends!

text: 俺は絶対に仲間を裏切らねぇ！
romaji: Ore wa zettai ni nakama o uragiranē!
english: I will never betray my friends!
